main event: A bright light resembling the full moon was observed in the northern sky moving erratically and descending over Eatonton, Georgia on July 20, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described to be bright and large like a full moon., The sighting lasted 5-10 minutes., The weather conditions were cloudy with a storm approaching., The object disappeared at about 40 degrees above the horizon., The observer is considered a reliable source.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
